    if *vpcID == "" {
        // Get a list of VPCs so we can associate the group with the first VPC.
        result, err := svc.DescribeVpcs(nil)
        if err != nil {
            return "", "", err
        }
        if len(result.Vpcs) == 0 {
            return "", "", errors.New("There are no VPCs to associate with")
        }

        vID = *result.Vpcs[0].VpcId
    }
